dataset_id: SAFARI 2000 Annual Soil Respiration Data (Raich and Schlesinger 1992)
title: SAFARI 2000 Annual Soil Respiration Data (Raich and Schlesinger 1992)
summary: This data set is a compilation of soil respiration rates (g C m-2 yr-1) from terrestrial and wetland ecosystems reported in the literature prior to 1992 subset for the Safari 2000 project. These rates were measured in a variety of ecosystems to examine rates of microbial activity, nutrient turnover, carbon cycling, root dynamics, and a variety of other soil processes.
